meanings.definition: Convert (an atom, molecule, or substance) into an ion or ions.
meanings.sent1: She ionized the water by adding salt to it.
meanings.sent2: The scientist ionized the gas to study its properties.
meanings.sent3: The chef ionized the sugar in a magical cooking experiment.
meanings.sent4: His words ionized the atmosphere, sparking a heated debate.
meanings.sent5: The lightning storm ionized the air, creating a charged environment.
